title: Denis Leary
summary: Denis Colin Leary (born August 18, 1957) is an American actor, comedian, producer, and writer. A native of Massachusetts, Leary first came to prominence as a stand-up comedian, especially through appearances on MTV (including the parody song "Asshole") and through the stand-up specials No Cure for Cancer (1993) and Lock 'n Load (1997). Leary began taking roles in film and television starting in the early 1990s, including substantial roles in the films Demolition Man (1993), Judgment Night (1993), the Ref (1994), and Two If By Sea (1996).
